name: s-t-m
description: S-T-M stands for Services, Tools, and Modules; STM is a microservice architecture manager

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist/ && cp package.json yarn.lock LICENSE readme.md dist/
scripts.patch: npm version patch -m 'v%s' && js-beautify -r package.json && git commit -a --amend --no-edit

author: “Raymond <“raymond.benefield@gmail.com”> (https://twitter.com/RayBenefield)
